Sheraton Lagos Hotel bụ ụlọ nkwari akụ nwere kpakpando ise na Lagos
E guzobere ya na 1985, ma wuo ya na Ikeja isi obodo steeti ahụ, ọ bụ otu n'ime nnukwu họtel na Naịjirịa
Ụlọ nkwari akụ Sheraton Lagos bụ akụkụ nke ụlọ nkwari akụ Marriott International.
Ụlọ nkwari akụ ahụ nwere ọnụ ụlọ ndị ọbịa 337 na ebe n'okpuru anopu, n'ime ụlọ isii nwere ọtụtụ okpukpu, na gburugburu gụnyere Murtala Muhammed International Airport, ụlọ ahịa Spar na Club Vegas
Sheraton Lagos Hotels nwekwara ụlọ nkwari akụ nwanne nwanyị na Island nke akpọrọ Four Point site na Sheraton.
Sheraton Hotels Lagos nwere ebe mgbakọ ise dị mma na ihe omume ndị mere n'ebe ahụ gụnyere agbamakwụkwọ, nzukọ na ihe ngosi mba ụwa. Ụlọ oriri nke kachasị ukwuu, nwere ike ịnọdụ ala ruo mmadụ 300.
E nwere ụlọ oriri na ọṅụṅụ na ụlọ mmanya ise n'ime ụlọ nkwari akụ ahụ
